notes: This file defines ED-anchored proxies for 'sky' constellations.
Each constellation points to one or more anchor groups; anchors must be resolvable ED system names in your local catalogs.
The builder will compute: vector = mean( normalize(anchor_xyz - Sol) * weight ) then scale to vector_length_ly.
recommended_workflow: 2) Review the output list of missed systems.
3) Replace missed names with systems that exist in your catalog (omphalos_systems.csv is best).
4) Re-run builder until each constellation has at least min_anchors_to_form_vector resolved anchors.
